title: [SOLVED]820 3332, don't start with battery plugged
message:
Hey guys, 

Other shop repair while replacing the trackpad fuck charge circuit!!! 

this board don't start with battery connected, and when i plug the battery the fans run's intermittent!! (original charger).  with a fake charge the machine start's well but don't recognize the battery!! 

this board has never been touched! Q7080 again?? 

thaks

title: [SOLVED]820 3332, don't start with battery plugged
message: Resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of the ISL?

title: [SOLVED]820 3332, don't start with battery plugged
message:
PPVBAT_G3H_CONN = 12.56V but not constant. voltage drop 12.56v to 6.7V and go again to 12.56v. 

PPVBAT_G3H_CHGR = 12.56V constant!

title: [SOLVED]820 3332, don't start with battery plugged
message: I'm guessing you tried a good battery?

title: [SOLVED]820 3332, don't start with battery plugged
message: TCRScircuit, ty for you help! yes battery problem!! the client fuck the battery when tried to replace a trackpad! ty

title: [SOLVED]820 3332, don't start with battery plugged
message: Good luck finding a good battery for these. You will find your Chinese garbage replacement will shut down somewhere around 20%.....
